cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: Proud ..., bearing an aura, she is indeed(?) the beloved child of great An
Ninisina, given birth to by Uraš, from the womb towards greatness(?)
Exalted advisor of her birth father, true steward of the ... temple
Fitting ..., may it be appropriate for the pure(?) throne(?)
May its supreme way/divine decree be praised(!?)
Cosmic powers ... apart from the other cosmic powers, he ... for you
To ... the entire intestines(?), to ... from the lying man(?)
To rouse and wrap/heap up(?) a man, you brought ... away from the heart/womb/innards/stomach(?)
Your physician's art ... the living man and dead man for you
Lady whose incantation formula cannot be changed/cut (i.e., interrupted?)(?), ...
If boils(!?) ... on the body(?) of a man(?)...
